solution_line_template: On the 2nd week, Paul halved the first week's sugar, therefore he used {first_week_sugar}/{halving_divisor} = <<{first_week_sugar}/{halving_divisor}={second_week_sugar}>>{second_week_sugar} cups
The third week, Paul used {second_week_sugar}/{halving_divisor} = <<{second_week_sugar}/{halving_divisor}={third_week_sugar}>>{third_week_sugar} cups
The fourth week, he used {third_week_sugar}/{halving_divisor} = <<{third_week_sugar}/{halving_divisor}={fourth_week_sugar}>>{fourth_week_sugar} cups
